THAT IS NOT WHAT CS IS ABOUT! it's about taking points with the team! It used to be hard to get get a match.  wich it should be! only the guys wanted to have match got one! the guys that wanted compete! now, every fucking bitch thinks they know how to play it because they got high rank. you should be ashamed of yourself! get back to your roots!
